item.title: Bangladeshi shot dead by BSF near border in Chuadanga
item.description: A Bangladeshi man was shot dead by India’s Border Security Force (BSF) at the Gayeshpur border in Jibannagar upazila of Chuadanga district on Saturday. The BSF took away his body after the shooting. The dead man was identified as Shahidul Islam, 37, son of Noskor Ali from Gayeshpur village.
